page.title: 09Ellesmere Port, Shopping
page.content: Several changes in the nature of retailing have taken place in Ellesmere Port in recent years. In 1983 Lewis's Saverstore closed down, but the site was soon taken over by { {ASDA Ltd.}who now provide the largest retail outlet in the area. A second major change concerns {Ellesmere Port Market}which has undergone a scheme of expansion. A new covered area has been opened, giving double the area for stalls to be set up in. The adjacent bus station and large car park make this a much improved shopping centre.
